title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.4 - List of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.4 - List of records

State Regulations
(a) On behalf
of the authority, the records access officer shall maintain and make available
for inspection at the authority's main office a current list, reasonably
detailed by subject matter, of the types of records produced, filed or
promulgated by the authority. Such list shall be sufficiently detailed to
permit the applicant to identify the file category of the records
sought. (b) Said subject matter list
shall be updated periodically, but in no event less than semiannually, and the
date of the most recent updating shall appear on the first page
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4700.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
